thread.title: Patricia Miller

author: Patricia Miller
title: Patricia Miller
text: We've been using the Trusted House-Sitters website to find and arrange many amazing house-sits in the past two years (since 2014). Thanks to the contacts that we were able to make via this website, we spent three months in Europe in 2015 and several months caring for home/pets in Canada and the United States. It's a great website which is well managed and reliable. It's a popular site which makes it an invaluable tool for those who like to travel slowly.... Don't hesitate to join; it's a great resource.... Patricia
